definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
one side/other/different/lateral component of a Chinese character (such as 刂[dao1], 亻[ren2] etc)

sentences.english: The keepers, Fiori and Kalac , trained apart.
sentences.chinese: 門將費奧裏和卡拉奇，在一旁訓練。

sentences.english: The female cub is waiting aside and see if her brothers have made any progress.
sentences.chinese: 小雌虎則在一旁等待哥哥們有沒有進展。

sentences.english: When Bertha came up to him he put her gently aside.
sentences.chinese: 當伯莎來到他身邊時，他輕輕地把她推在一旁。

sentences.english: It was John who thrust a person aside.
sentences.chinese: 是約翰把一個人猛推在一旁的。

sentences.english: On the side where the path is, there are willows, interlaced with some others whose names I do not know.
sentences.chinese: 路的一旁，是些楊柳，和一些不知道名字的樹。

sentences.english: How can a side, the spot asked Zhu Xiaoshui is a small she-wolf.
sentences.chinese: 一旁的何其聽得莫明其妙，當場詢問朱曉誰是小母狼。

sentences.english: Visible on the upper right are the crescent Moon and the bright planet Venus.
sentences.chinese: 右上角可見弦月與一旁明亮的金星。

sentences.english: Comfortable son fierce title, the eyeful tears looking at a side sits of woman.
sentences.chinese: 舒兒猛的擡頭，滿眼淚水的看着一旁坐着的女子。

sentences.english: She just keep silent at a side , no explainations .
sentences.chinese: 她只是在一旁沉默着，沒有解釋。

sentences.english: But I titter in the one side.
When he was giving a lecture, more than ten of his students stood aside respectfully.
sentences.chinese: 他演講時，他的十幾號弟子都畢恭畢敬地立在一旁。

sentences.english: Shivering in their wet clothes, the teenagers looked on while three men dived repeatedly into the water to locate the dish.
sentences.chinese: 那幾個孩子衣服還溼着，此時在一旁哆哆嗦嗦地看着。

sentences.english: For many Americans, sports do not just occupy the sidelines.
sentences.chinese: 對於多數美國人而言，運動並非只是一旁站的小消遣。

sentences.english: The brocade Yuan early annoyed fast to chance inner harm in a side.
sentences.chinese: 錦媛在一旁早氣的快成內傷了。

sentences.english: We sit on a couch on set, a well-thumbed script beside her.
sentences.chinese: 我們坐在一旁的沙發上，發現她身邊放着一份劇本。

definition: one side/either side/on the one hand/on the other hand/doing while
to get up/to leave/to set forth
to turn one's head/to turn around
nutation (plants turning to face the sun)
to turn one's head/to change direction/U-turn/volte face/to repent
